publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1958 Colin Fox: NHS Services for Older People—That the Parliament notes the NHS Lothian public consultation document, Improving Care, Investing in Change 2004; believes that the proposed closure of the Royal Victoria Hospital, Edinburgh, set out in the section on services for older people, will lead to the loss of beds for older people in the NHS; opposes the closure of the hospital, and calls for it to be upgraded and improved to provide a centre of excellence for medicine for elderly people in the Lothians.
